description:
“Radioactive” by Imagine Dragons Vintage Jazz cover by Postmodern Jukebox ft. Rogelio Douglas, Jr. 🎶  Get The Song: http://pmjlive.com/radioactive  world 🌎 World Tour Tix: http://pmjtour.com 
Subscribe: http://bit.ly/subPMJ | PMJ on Spotify: http://pmjlive.com/pmjspotify 

In celebration of ten years of touring the world, we’re spending the Summer releasing a few special “10th Anniversary Tour” editions of classic PMJ arrangements, performed by some of our current stars on tour. Here's the last one: #PMJtour's "triple threat" emcee Rogelio Douglas, Jr.'s thrilling version of Imagine Dragons' "Radioactive," which we originally recorded with Blake Lewis in 2015.

Watch the original version: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RCWBxxEJiGc

Follow Rogelio Douglas, Jr.: 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100047318435878
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/rdtripthret
X: https://x.com/rogeliojr

See Postmodern Jukebox LIVE! Tickets On Sale NOW for the US/Canada, UK, Europe, Aus
title: Radioactive (10th Anniversary Tour Version) ft. Rogelio Douglas, Jr.
